title: Update:  Reservations for Viewing the Shroud of Turin in 2015
post: When will booking reservations for the shroud exhibition be possible and at what website will the reservations be made?

title: Update:  Reservations for Viewing the Shroud of Turin in 2015
post:
Unfortunately, the link for making reservations for viewing the Shroud of Turin in 2015 is not working! Could somebody please take care of fixing it?
Thank you in advance for your help.
author: Arturo Ruiz
